text.quote: 000: Clause 41, page 35, line 25, at end insert—
“(4) In the case of financial abuse investigation may be instigated following a complaint from a person with power of attorney for an adult having needs for care and support.”
000: Before Clause 42, insert the following new Clause—
text.IndentOne: All persons and organisations offering care services shall have a duty to follow specific accounting guidelines in charging for those services and shall, in particular, ensure that all accounting paperwork is easy to understand, fully explains any interface with the Local Authority and is complete.”
